textAfterTable: 3 Details 3.1 Hints 4 Division of Labour 5 Completed Bugs 5.1 High priority bugs 5.2 Bugs needing Version Field changed 5.3 Valid bugs with step-by-step instructions 5.4 Bugs that are RESOLVED 5.5 Duplicate Bugs 5.6 INVALID bugs 5.7 Valid bugs that should be marked as NEW 5.8 KWin bugs that need attention from developers 5.9 Bugs needing Feedback 5.10 Bugs that need particular setups/equipment to test 5.11 Performance issues 5.12 Bugs you can't do 5.13 Wishes [edit] Introduction [edit] Goals of this Week This bugweek tries to improve the quality of the 4.6 release by triaging all recent bug reports (bugs from 4.6-beta1 and the pre-beta versions). We also check if the bugs for 4.5 apply for 4.6 and triage those. [edit] Prerequisites You should have a recent version of KDE, preferably trunk or the beta 1 release. You can still
